thread.title: This Airline Just Banned All Electronic Devices on Board
thread.title_full: This Airline Just Banned All Electronic Devices on Board

author: jplautz1271
title: This Airline Just Banned All Electronic Devices on Board
text:
Cellphones and medical devices needed during flight are excluded. 
Royal Jordanian airlines announced on Twitter on Monday that passengers cannot bring any electronic devices on flights to or from the U.S. 
‚ÄúFollowing instructions from the concerned US departments, we kindly inform our dearest passengers departing to and arriving from the United States that carrying any electronic or electrical device on board the flight cabins is strictly prohibited,‚Äù the statement reads. ‚ÄúCellular phones and medical devices needed during the flight are excluded from the ban.‚Äù Attention all passengers üõë pic.twitter.com/VjN58EbJkJ 
‚Äî Royal Jordanian (@RoyalJordanian) March 20, 2017 
Prohibited devices include:
